subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Before the key Group A game, Croatian Coach Niko Kovac said the Mexicans’ knees should be trembling at the thought of meeting his squad, but they proved to be cool under fire.
snippet: Before the key Group A game, Croatian Coach Niko Kovac said the Mexicans’ knees should be trembling at the thought of meeting his squad, but they proved to be cool under fire.
